titleStmt.title: Asteria and Tamberlain, or, The distressed lovers a novel / written in French by a person of quality ; and rendred into English by E.C., Esq.
Astérie ou Tamerlan. English
titleStmt.author: La Roche-Guilhen, Mlle. de (Anne), 1644-1707.
E. C., Esq.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to La Roche-Guihen. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Another ed. was published as: Royal lovers, or, The unhappy prince.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
